# EntityMovementHoverComponent Class

## Extends
- [*EntityBaseMovementComponent*](EntityBaseMovementComponent.md)

When added, this move control causes the mob to hover.

## Constants

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:movement.hover";`
